aws_apigatewayv2_vpc_link.subcategory: API Gateway v2 (WebSocket and HTTP APIs)
aws_apigatewayv2_vpc_link.description: Manages an Amazon API Gateway Version 2 VPC Link.

name.description: The name of the VPC Link.

security_group_ids.description: Security group IDs for the VPC Link.

subnet_ids.description: Subnet IDs for the VPC Link.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the VPC Link.
